channel.title: CHMView
channel.description: As a fast,easy to use CHM Viewer in IPad, CHMView will be release soon.

item.title: Add bookmarks
item.description:
You can add bookmarks when you view a page.The bookmark will be stored to bookmark list when you click ”Add”.Also you can change the title of bookmark.


















When show bookmarks list, you can edit it by click the “Edit” button to modify it.
Normally, you just need to click the bookmark you need to jump to the page you favorite.

item.title: View the contents
item.description: When you view the contents, you can resize the view and font,also you can scrolling to view to.

item.title: Select index from master view
item.description:
After you opened a CHM book,the chapter informations automatic loaded. You can click chapter information from the master view in the left.
Tips: if the master view didn’t show, you can click “Show Master” to show it.

item.title: Select index from popover view
item.description:
After you opened a CHM book,the chapter informations automatic loaded. You can click popover to show the chapter information.
When you click on the the chapter, the page content will be shown in the detail page.

item.title: Open the CHM files
item.description:
When click “Books” button, all the documents added by itunes file sharing show up.You can just click one you need to open it!
Tips: reopen it is very quick, so you can quickly switch between two CHM files.

item.title: Add CHM files through iTunes File Sharing
item.description:
Using iTunes 9.1 or later, you can copy files to and from your computer and apps on iPad that support File Sharing.(http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4094)

1.Connect iPad to your computer using the included Dock Connector to USB cable.
2.Click the Apps tab and scroll down to the bottom of the page.
3.Under the File Sharing section, you’ll find a list of apps currently installed on your iPad that support File Sharing. Select CHMView to view a list of the files associated with the app on your iPad.
4.Drag and drop files onto the Documents list to copy them to the app on your iPad.

item.title: Start to Use
item.description:
CHMView is a compiled HTML(.chm) file reader for iPad.

FEATURES:
View CHM files with ease,
Automatic open latest file,
Customizable text size,
Reading by scrolling,
Navigate through Table of Contents,
Bookmark Management with ease,
iTunes File Sharing.

You can use it from following step
1. Add CHM files through iTunes File Sharing.
2. Open the CHM files.
3. Select index from popover view or left view.
4. View the contents.
5. Add bookmarks.
